<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Razmiran Faithful](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=60)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 34 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Broken Lands

</column>

You serve a living god who rules upon the face of Golarion, and this gives your actions a divine mandate not to be trifled with.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength
or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) skill, and the [Razmir Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Group Coercion](/Feats.aspx?ID=788) skill feat.
